message.content:
<<<api>>>: StringTokenizer.nextToken
<<<code>>>: 
```java
String number= "(1234) 567-8910";
StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(number, "-()");
while (st.hasMoreTokens()) {
    System.out.println(st.nextToken());
}
```
<<<explanation>>>: The StringTokenizer class in Java is used to break a string into tokens. In this case, we are using the StringTokenizer.nextToken method to split the string based on the specified delimiters, which are - and (). The while loop continues until there are no more tokens left to return. Each token (substring) is then printed out.
